    @allure.feature("Student Enrollment")
    @allure.story("Performance Benchmark")
    def test_student_page_performance_benchmark(logged_in_page):
        """Benchmark test for student page operations"""
    
        print("ğŸ“Š RUNNING STUDENT PAGE PERFORMANCE BENCHMARK")
    
        # Test multiple operations and measure times
        operations = {}
    
        # 1. Navigation benchmark
        start_time = time.time()
        student_page = StudentInscritPage(logged_in_page)
        student_page.fast_navigate_from_login()
        operations["navigation"] = time.time() - start_time
    
        # 2. Student count benchmark
        start_time = time.time()
        visible_count = student_page.fast_get_visible_students_count()
        total_count = student_page.fast_get_total_students_count()
        operations["count_check"] = time.time() - start_time
    
        # 3. Student info benchmark
        start_time = time.time()
        students_info = student_page.fast_get_students_info()
        operations["student_info"] = time.time() - start_time
    
        # 4. Enrolled students benchmark
        start_time = time.time()
        enrolled_count, enrolled_list = student_page.fast_get_all_enrolled_students()
        operations["enrolled_check"] = time.time() - start_time
    
        # Calculate total time
        total_time = sum(operations.values())
    
        # Generate benchmark report
        benchmark_report = (
            f"ğŸ“Š STUDENT PAGE PERFORMANCE BENCHMARK\n"
            f"â±ï¸  Navigation: {operations['navigation']:.1f}s\n"
            f"ğŸ“Š Count Check: {operations['count_check']:.1f}s\n"
            f"ğŸ‘¥ Student Info: {operations['student_info']:.1f}s\n"

            f"ğŸ“Š Total Students: {total_count}\n"
            f"âœ… Enrolled Students: {enrolled_count}\n"
            f"ğŸ“‹ Info Retrieved: {len(students_info)} records"

        allure.attach(benchmark_report, name="Performance Benchmark", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
